effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.platinum: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.
flavor_text.platinum: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.
